mapper.insert: insert into blogs (id, titile, create_time, update_time, author, if_deleted, content) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{titile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ifDeleted,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.select: select id, titile, create_time, update_time, author, if_deleted, content from blogs
mapper.insert: insert into blogs (id, titile, create_time, update_time, author, if_deleted, content) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{titile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ifDeleted,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
